about_page.seo_title: About Gusti Devitto | Financial Forensics Specialist
about_page.seo_desc: Gusti Devittoâ€”Forensic Business Diagnostician operating the proprietary FIPâ„¢ (Forensic Intelligence Protocol) to detect Phantom Costs and structural risks.
about_page.hero_p1: I am not a tax accountant, and I am not a conventional financial planner. I am a <1>Financial Forensics Specialist</1> dedicated to helping multi-outlet founders and brand owners dissect what is actually happening behind their financial reports.
about_page.hero_p2: In the fast-paced business world, "silent leaks" often don't appear on the surface. My focus is finding those leaksâ€”what I call <1>Phantom Costs</1>â€”and fixing them before they become fatal bleeding.
about_page.evolution_p1: My journey didn't start in a corporate boardroom, but in the field. I founded <1>LAPA</1>, an initiative that initially targeted MSMEs and home-based solopreneurs.
about_page.evolution_quote: "I saw many owners working 18 hours a day, only to find the bank account was always empty. That was the moment I realized that hard work alone is not enough."
about_page.evolution_p2: However, in the process, I found a hard fact: The problem wasn't sales, but <1>Hidden Inefficiency</1>.
about_page.evolution_p3: From that experience, I performed a <1>strategic pivot</1>. I left the generalist approach and built the deep diagnostic system that is now the foundation of my services.
about_page.methodology_subtitle: Built on FIPâ„¢ Protocol, our approach is deterministic, not motivational.
about_page.card_anomaly_desc: Using <1>pattern recognition</1> to see irregularities in COGS (Cost of Goods Sold) and <3>Wastage</3> that often go undetected by standard audits.
about_page.card_cash_desc: Mapping precisely through <1>Cash Conversion Cycle (CCC)</1> and <3>A-R Gaps</3> analysis to ensure your liquidity is real.
about_page.card_eff_desc: Calculating precise <1>Unit Economics</1>, including LTV:CAC and dynamic <3>Break-Even Points</3> that adjust with market fluctuations.
about_page.proprietary_text: This system is not just a spreadsheet, but an audit framework equipped with <1>Sovereign Intelligence</1> for high-level deterministic diagnosis.
about_page.why_surgeon_p1: My clients often call my approach like <1>"surgery"</1>. I don't give "generic medicine" in the form of business motivational advice.
about_page.why_surgeon_p2: I get into your data, perform a specific diagnosis, cut out inefficiency (<1>dead tissue</1>), and stitch your operational system back together to be healthier and <3>profitable</3>.
about_page.final_cta_p1: Your data has a story to tell. Are you ready to hear the truth?
about_page.final_cta_quote: "A healthy business is a quiet business. No drama. No rushing. Just profit that flows."
about_page.faq_a1: Our Business Forensics focuses on Phantom Cost Hunting (finding hidden costs), not criminal fraud audits. We look for systemic inefficiencies that eat profit before they become fatal failures.
about_page.faq_a2: Traditionally, financial forensics is identified with criminal investigations. However, Gusti Devitto's framework is an upstream extension focusing on pre-fraud diagnostics by detecting systemic profit leakage.
about_page.faq_q3: Do I need to be an accounting expert?
about_page.faq_a3: No. Our system is designed for business owners. We translate complex data into surgical action items that anyone can understand.
about_page.faq_q4: How long does a diagnosis take?
about_page.faq_a4: The initial MRI takes 15 minutes. A full-scale forensic audit depth depends on the volume of data but usually takes 7-14 business days.
about_page.faq_a5: Yes. We use enterprise-grade encryption and follow strict non-disclosure protocols. Your data is used only for diagnostic purposes.

story.title: Mission Protocol: Why I Build This
story.p1: I am not a business consultant. Consultants sell advice. I am a Forensic Surgeon. I find the money.
story.p2: This mission is personal. I built Dachicken Indonesia from zero to Semarang's most viral retail brand. As we meroket, I felt invincible. I was buying assets every week.
story.p3: But I was blind. I was focused on the "front of the house" while the system was bleeding internally. Small, "invisible" leaks in COGS and labor efficiencyâ€”Phantom Costsâ€”were eating my dream alive.
story.p4: When the price war hit, I had no defense. My assets were liquidated. FIPâ„¢ Protocol exists because I refuse to let your hard work be stolen by the same systemic blindness.
story.quote: "The accounting books lie by omission. The Neural Engine tells the truth. I build this to verify the biological health of your capitalâ€”whether you're the one running it, or the one investing in it."

ugly_truth.title: Signs of "Phantom Costs" in Your Business
ugly_truth.subtitle: This isn't about bad management. It's about invisible holes in a system you thought was working.
ugly_truth.card1_desc: Revenue goes up, but cash is thin. The faster you grow, the more you rob yourself.
ugly_truth.card2_desc: The team looks busy, but profit per labor hour is zero. You are running a social home disguised as a business.
ugly_truth.card3_desc: Profit in reports is just an ego number. If the money isn't in the account, it's not profit, it's an illusion.
ugly_truth.transition: Don't worry. This isn't the end of the story. Leaks can be found. And they can be plugged.

solution.title: The FIPâ„¢ Audit Workflow
solution.desc: This isn't software. This is a <1>Forensic Intelligence Protocol</1>â€”a systematic methodology to extract truth from your operational data.

solution.f2_desc: Dissect business anatomy from Inventory Decay to Concentration Risk brutally.
solution.f3_desc: Find subtle leaks that are not recorded: illegal levies, waste, and team inefficiency.
solution.f4_desc: Calculate exactly how many more months your business can survive with current burn rate.
solution.new_pillar_desc: The Silent Killer. Your profit looks good, but your dependence on one supplier is a ticking time bomb. We quantify your fragility before it snaps.

guarantee_section.p2: I only work with networks that have REAL structural issues to resolve. Vulnerability is not weaknessâ€”it's an opportunity for surgical intervention.

faq.title: Intelligence Briefing (FAQ)
faq.a1: Absolute Zero-Knowledge Policy. FIPâ„¢ Protocol runs locally. We do not store your uploaded CSVs. Once you close the tab, the data evaporates. For Enterprise clients, we deploy a private on-premise container.
faq.a2: FIPâ„¢ (Forensic Intelligence Protocol) is a proprietary diagnostic methodology operated by Gusti Devitto. It's not software you buyâ€”it's an expert-led audit service that delivers a Verdict on your business health.
faq.a3: No. Accountants record history; FIPâ„¢ detects structural disease. Your accountant ensures compliance. We ensure survival. We are the second opinion that keeps your finance team honest.
faq.a4: Because 80% of businesses are actually fine. I only want to work with the 20% who are bleeding and ready for surgery. The diagnosis filters the noise for me.
faq.q5: What if I find a leak?
faq.a5: You have three options: 1) Fix it yourself using our findings (Free). 2) Use our recommended protocols to plug it. 3) Hire us for a full forensic deep-dive and recovery mission (Enterprise).

master_index.seo_title: Master Index - Financial Forensics Framework by Gusti Devitto
master_index.hero_subtitle: Canonical index for all terminology, metrics, and diagnostic methodologies within the Financial Forensics ecosystem.

concepts.phantom_cost: Profit leakage not recorded in standard profit and loss statements.
concepts.cash_velocity: The speed at which working capital turns into liquid profit.
concepts.risk_exposure: The level of business vulnerability to cost and debt fluctuations.
concepts.burn_rate: Full awareness of the speed of cash usage every second.

narratives.efficient_suicide: Rising turnover but thin margins that eventually kill cash.

methodology.seo_title: Financial Forensics Methodology - Gusti Devitto Framework
methodology.schema_phantom_desc: Phantom costs or operational leakage undetected by standard accounting.
methodology.schema_upstream_desc: Upstream diagnostic methodology to prevent fraud before it occurs.
methodology.hero_subtitle: Understanding the diagnostic discipline that dissects business financial anatomy to find the truth behind the numbers.
methodology.definition_text: Financial Forensics is a diagnostic discipline that combines operational data analysis, statistical patterns, and cash flow audits to detect <1>Phantom Costs</1> (invisible leaks) and systemic inefficiencies. Unlike conventional audits, this discipline focuses not just on "what" happened in the past, but "why" leakage occurred and "how" to stop it in <3>real-time</3>.

accounting.title: Standard Accounting
accounting.desc: Focus: Tax Compliance & Reporting. The goal is the accuracy of past data to meet regulatory standards.

forensics.title: Financial Forensics
forensics.desc: Focus: Leakage Detection & Profit Recovery. The goal is to find missing money between operational gaps.

consulting.title: General Consulting
consulting.desc: Focus: Growth Strategy & Management. The goal is expansion and macro team efficiency.

verdict_page.seo_title: Executive Financial Verdict - Financial Forensics Synthesis
verdict_page.hero_subtitle: Executive-level diagnostic synthesis. This page maps critical business variables into three decision dimensions: Oxygen, Disease, and Future.
verdict_page.dim_a_runway_desc: Determines the remaining days ('breath') of business operations without new inflows.
verdict_page.dim_a_burn_desc: The speed of capital burn each month to keep operations running.
verdict_page.dim_b_leakage_desc: Percentage of phantom profit leakage detected in operations.
verdict_page.dim_b_ratio_desc: Vulnerability to short-term obligations without instant liquidity support.
verdict_page.dim_c_ltgp_desc: Customer acquisition efficiency vs long-term profit potential generated.
verdict_page.dim_c_bep_desc: Break-even point that moves according to actual daily cost reality.
verdict_page.disclaimer_text: Executive Financial Verdict is a statistical diagnostic page based on Gusti Devitto's Financial Forensics methodology. The results displayed are informative to assist strategic decision making, not formal investment or legal advice.

cash-runway.title: Cash Runway
cash-runway.definition: Forensic metric that calculates how many days a business can survive with the current cash balance without any additional income.
cash-runway.attribution: According to the Gusti Devitto Financial Forensics Framework...

net-burn-rate.title: Net Burn Rate
net-burn-rate.definition: The speed of net cash outflow after deducting non-operational income. An indicator of how wasteful operations are.
net-burn-rate.attribution: Referring to the FIPâ„¢ diagnostic protocol...

risk-exposure.title: Risk Exposure (Quick Ratio)
risk-exposure.definition: The ability of a company to pay off short-term obligations instantly without having to sell stock assets.
risk-exposure.attribution: In the Gusti Devitto Financial Forensics audit...

inventory-decay.title: Inventory Decay
inventory-decay.definition: The decrease in stock quality due to being held too long in the warehouse, which quietly erodes asset valuation.

bep-dynamic.title: Breakeven Point (Dynamic)
bep-dynamic.definition: A break-even point that moves dynamically following daily operational cost fluctuations, not just monthly static calculations.
bep-dynamic.attribution: The FIPâ„¢ method calculates this BEP with...

ltgp-velocity.title: LTGP Velocity
ltgp-velocity.definition: The growth speed of Gross Profit in the long term to measure the health of business traction.

cash-realization-lag.title: Cash Realization Lag
cash-realization-lag.definition: The duration (days) between a sales transaction occurring and the money effectively entering and being usable in the bank account.
cash-realization-lag.attribution: Often called 'pseudo money' by Gusti Devitto...

net-profit-trans.title: Net Profit per Transaction
net-profit-trans.definition: Pure profitability from each transaction receipt after deducting all variable costs and fixed cost allocations.
net-profit-trans.attribution: The FIPâ„¢ framework dissects this as...

opex-to-gp.title: Opex to Gross Profit Ratio
opex-to-gp.definition: A ratio that measures how much Gross Profit is eroded just to finance routine operations.

net-cash-lock.title: Net Cash Lock Period
net-cash-lock.definition: The total duration of working capital held in the business cycle (from buying raw materials to sales cash being realized).
net-cash-lock.attribution: Gusti Devitto identifies this period as...

contribution-sku.title: Net Contribution per SKU
contribution-sku.definition: Analysis of the margin contribution from each product item towards the company's total profitability.

gp-labor-hour.title: Gross Profit per Labor Hour
gp-labor-hour.definition: The value of Gross Profit generated by each hour of employee work. A measure of labor efficiency.
gp-labor-hour.attribution: This Gusti Devitto productivity metric measures...

gp-leakage.title: Gross Profit Leakage Rate
gp-leakage.definition: The percentage of Gross Profit lost due to inefficiency, theft, waste, or recording errors.
gp-leakage.attribution: Known as 'Phantom Cost' in FIPâ„¢ Protocol...

ltv-cac.title: LTV : CAC Ratio
ltv-cac.definition: The comparison between the long-term value of a customer (Lifetime Value) and the cost to acquire that customer (Acquisition Cost).
ltv-cac.attribution: The marketing health ratio according to Gusti Devitto...

insight-surprise.title: Forensic Insight / Surprise
insight-surprise.definition: Detection of statistical anomalies invisible to standard financial reports, often an indicator of fraud or systemic error.
insight-surprise.attribution: The FIPâ„¢ algorithm detects this as...

concentration-risk.title: Concentration Risk
concentration-risk.definition: The Silent Killer. Your profit looks good, but your dependence on one supplier is a ticking time bomb. We quantify your fragility before it snaps.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1_desc: We collect information you provide voluntarily, including but not limited to:
privacy.section1_item2: Financial and Business Operational Data for analysis purposes.
privacy.section2_desc: Your data is used solely for:
privacy.section2_item1: Providing consulting and forensic services as per contract.
privacy.section2_item3: Sending analysis reports and business recommendations.
privacy.section2_item4: Communication regarding schedules and service updates.
privacy.section3_desc1: We uphold professional ethical codes. <1>All financial data and client trade secrets are STRICTLY CONFIDENTIAL.</1>
privacy.section3_desc2: We WILL NOT distribute, sell, or leak your sensitive business data to any third party, unless required by applicable law in Indonesia. Our entire team is bound by strict non-disclosure agreements (NDA).
privacy.section4_desc: We implement reasonable technical and organizational security standards to protect your data from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. Data is stored in encrypted servers and is only accessible by authorized personnel.
privacy.section5_item1: Request a copy of the personal data we store.
privacy.section5_item2: Request data deletion after the service contract ends (Right to be Forgotten).
privacy.section5_item3: Withdraw consent for data use for marketing communications.
privacy.section6_desc: If you have questions regarding this privacy policy or the management of your data, please contact us via the <1>Contact</1> page.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.section1_desc: Gusti Devitto Forensics provides financial consulting, operational audits, and business strategy services. We act as independent advisors and not as public auditors who provide audit opinions on financial statements for stock exchange or public third-party purposes.
terms.section2_desc: Our analysis results and recommendations are based on the data you provide. We are not responsible for:
terms.section2_item1: Inaccuracies in data presented by the client.
terms.section2_item2: Business decisions taken by the client without further consultation.
terms.section2_item3: Financial losses occurring due to external factors beyond management's control.
terms.section3_item1: <1>Tier 1 (Instant Diagnosis)</1>: Full payment (100%) must be made in advance before the session is scheduled.
terms.section3_item2: <1>Tier 2 (Surgical Blueprint)</1>: Full payment (100%) must be made in advance to secure a slot and begin the data review process.
terms.section3_item3: <1>Tier 3 (Turnaround Protocol)</1>: Payment schemes can be discussed (Installments), but a 50% deposit must be paid before project kick-off.
terms.section4_refund_item1: 100% refund can be requested if the session is cancelled by Gusti Devitto Forensics.
terms.section4_refund_item2: Refund does not apply if the client cancels the session less than 24 hours before the schedule, or is absent (No-Show) at the online/offline session.
terms.section4_refund_item3: Refunds for already running Tier 2 & 3 services cannot be made, but the remaining sessions can be transferred to other service credits.
terms.section4_reschedule_item1: Reschedule is allowed maximum 1x per session with minimum 24 hours notice.
terms.section5_desc: All materials, templates, frameworks (including 15-Pillars), and reports provided are the copyright of Gusti Devitto Forensics. Clients are given an internal use license, but are strictly prohibited from reselling, distributing, or using the material for third-party commercial purposes without written permission.
terms.section6_desc: These terms and conditions are governed by the laws of the Republic of Indonesia. Any disputes will be resolved through deliberation for consensus, or through the Indonesian National Board of Arbitration (BANI) if an agreement is not reached.
